title: Write Dev.to launch article
description: Write a comprehensive article for Dev.to titled 'Building Hlavi: Git-Native Task Management with Next.js'. Cover the architecture, key decisions, challenges faced, and lessons learned. Include code snippets and screenshots.

acceptance_criteria.description: Write 1500-2000 word article with technical details
Include architecture diagrams and code snippets
Publish on Dev.to with relevant tags (nextjs, typescript, react)
